remarks: Modus ponendo tollens 2, one of the "indemonstrables" in Stoic logic. Note that this uses exclusive-or ` \/_ ` .  See rule 2 on [Lopez-Astorga] p. 12 , rule 4 on [Sanford] p. 39 and rule A4 in [Hitchcock] p. 5 .  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 2-Mar-2018.)
statement:
mpto2.1 $e |- ph $.
mpto2.2 $e |- ( ph \/_ ps ) $.
mpto2 $p |- -. ps $.
